short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension auto-confirms popups when moving a shared file or folder in Google Drive or creating new files in a shared folder.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When moving shared files or folders in Google Drive to a different location, a popup dialog titled "Change Who Has Access" appears, warning the user about contributors potentially loosing access. This can become annoying, especially in situations where this warning is inappropriate. This extension automatically confirms the dialog, saving the user one additional step when moving shared files.

New: Now the extension also confirms popups that appear when creating files in shared folders.

The extension is open-source. You can have a look at the source code here: https://github.com/master-software-gmbh/google-drive-extension
